text: Road to Morocco is a 1942 American comedy movie directed by David Butler and is the third movie in the Road to movies. It stars Bing Crosby, Bob Hope, Dorothy Lamour, Anthony Quinn, Dona Drake, Vladimir Sokoloff, George Givot, Leon Belasco and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1943. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by David Butler Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Morocco
title: Road to Morocco
